name: Obbo
description:
Made for Minijam 105: Dreamy https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-105-dreamy

Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

Controls

-----------------KeyboardXbox ControllerPlayStation ControllerMoveA/DLeft StickLeft StickJumpSpaceAXGround PoundShiftXSquare

Obbo dreams of gold...

Explore Obbo's dreams and complete platforming challenges to collect gold coins. Each room is hand made, but the way they fit together each playthrough is random. If you're stuck, or just want to make sure you see all the rooms, find a 'totem' and ground pound it. Collect enough coins and you'll see the credits and get a little reward.

Have Fun!

*Tip: You can save your jump! You have 1 jump you can use on the ground or in the air, and the jump gets returned when you land on solid ground. If something seems impossible, see if you can wait to use your jump at a more opportune time.
